> About

Been writing code professionally for about a decade. Started with PHP, got into TypeScript, fell in love with Python. Recently exploring vibe coding (thankfully missed the blockchain hype).

I enjoy working across the entire stack - from optimizing database queries to crafting smooth UIs, and making sure it all runs reliably in production.
